author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kardan's Unit, Tahal Wins Contract Of C. 37 Million Dollars In Russia
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Kardan Nv:
* KARDAN‘S UNIT, TAHAL, AWARDED A NEW PROJECT IN RUSSIA
* TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR PROJECT IS ABOUT USD 37 MILLION‍​ * ‍PROJECT WILL COMMENCE IMMEDIATELY AFTER RECEIPT OF AN ADVANCE OF 20% OF TOTAL COMPENSATION​
* PROJECT TO BE PERFORM OVER A 24-MONTH PERIOD * AFTER COMPLETION OF CONSTRUCTION, WARRANTY PERIOD OF 12 MTHS WILL FOLLOW Source text: bit.ly/2hLFCC4 Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
